website_summaries.verdict: An elegantly designed, curved eight-bar plug-in electric towel warmer that is designed to run 24-7.
pros: This wall-mounted unit heats up quickly, warming a towel in as little as 15 minutes
If you'd like to use it as a dryer, it takes between 2 to 8 hours
The thermostat keeps the unit from exceeding 149ºF so towels will not scorch
cons: Depending on how high up on your wall you install this unit, the on/off switch could be difficult to reach

customer_reviews.title: DIY unit, saves space
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy the Heatgene towel warmer to replace my freestanding towel warmer? I wanted a DIY unit (no electricians involved or hanging wires or timer leading to nowhere if I took it down) and more floor space. If you screw it into the studs, only another screwdriver will take it down. It's solid! The on/off button at the bottom lights up when the towel warmer is heating. I just broke down and bought a plug-in programmable timer, so if we keep on schedule, the towels will be warm.
customer_reviews.author: SOR

customer_reviews.title: Not child safe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this towel warmer. Easy on/off switch that illuminates red when on (see photo). It also has a radiator effect by warming the room. Just be careful not to rub against It. It gets hot enough to leave a blister. I dont recommend around unsupervised children. Install out of their reach.
customer_reviews.author: TxJean

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great but........
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install except the instructions are poorly written. Plus, there are no measurements provided or an installation template like you'd get with a Delta towel rack for example. Not a big deal but you have to measure the holes in the threaded pieces on the towel rack center to center and top to bottom to get the mounting pieces to fit exactly where they need to be installed. Just carefully measure and level where the holes in the wall should be and you'll be ok. Works great though.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Heats towels very nicely. I mounted mine with a 24 hour timer so that it will come on and go off at the right time to provide the function and still not waste energy. The only thing I would change about this product is which side the cord comes off of. Would have preferred it coming off left side when mounted on wall. Or better, if you could change which side the cord and switch are on. I was able to tie up the extra cord behind the towels on the lower mounting shafts.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't warm towel as expected
customer_reviews.text: After redoing the bathroom, we splurged and bought this towel warmer. It doesn't warm the entire towel. It warms it in spots. I was expecting to get out of the shower and be welcomed with a nice warm towel. It is priced too high for what little it does.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: The towel warmer looks beautiful and works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: The towel warmer looks beautiful and works extremely well. The towel warmer rack has high quality mirror finish. It dries towels nicely. I don’t need to worry about soggy towels especially during humid seasons. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: yi chen

customer_reviews.title: Needs time to work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get a hold of the company about this taking all day to warm a towel. But they sent me a message that I couldn't open. I wrote to them telling them that and now my replacement day is over by one day. They say to try to contact the company first but this time it didn't work out for me. This product doesn't work unless you heat the towels for hours and then just lukewarm. I wrote to them about it before the replacement date and here I am being nice has cost me.
customer_reviews.author: collette batten

customer_reviews.title: happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer is hotter then our old one. It is pretty warm to the touch - almost hot. My contractor was concerned about installing it because I have sliding door and he was afraid there was not enough room for the door to slide in. But he managed, so its either his mastership or it was good design. All I know is that the door is opening and the rack is close to the door opening. We just installed it, so I cant comment on the longevity, but I hope it lasts. ...
customer_reviews.author: AnV

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't even warm up a hand towel
customer_reviews.text: i turn it on when i wake up. by the time I get out of the shower it's at least 30-40 minutes. you can barely feel any heat at all on the towel and even the towel warmer is not very hot. I did leave it on one day and when i got home from work it was decently hot but i'm not leaving that thin on for eight hours just to warm a towel and risk burning the house down. I"m surprised it doesn't come with an auto shut-off after a certian period of time. i'm not sure any others work much better but I do know that this one does not work!
customer_reviews.author: 1mdaman

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm warm towels.
customer_reviews.text: Love having a warm towel in the morning. Only one problem, my husband mounted it to high and it is very hard to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine.Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I like and will like if is gonna work at least 7-10years.Too early for applauses. Quality is fine.Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: svetlana avrov

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Stainless Steel Parts, Must Install With Precision
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction and heat produced from this towel warmer. It does require careful measurements to drill the holes correctly to mount the brackets certainly; within 1/4" +/-. Mine did not come with instructions, but I was able to get them off the website. I have had other towel warmers, but this one is more solid and constructed from better materials, even the mounting screws are stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dully

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work. It will heat up and eventually dry towels. But it doesn’t warm or your towels at all. We left a towel on it overnight and the towel was warm at all. Very disappointed and would like to return for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Lbon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep it.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we are returning this, my husband didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: heather parrish

customer_reviews.title: Best part of our new bathroom it’s just as described and could not function without it now
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this towel warmer. He is from Scotland and it’s just like the one back home. It’s like having a part of his culture her in Tennessee. Highly recommend item.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P Ashman

customer_reviews.title: Towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking towel rack and NOT a towel warmer. the only areas that were warm was where the towel rested on the bars. I tried weaving it between the bars but it still didn't warm up the towels. The ones you find in the European hotels are much better and actually warm the entire towels. It does look beautiful though!
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly - a bear to put up but love my warm fuzzy towels after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: MTom

customer_reviews.title: Vague instructions
customer_reviews.text: Directions are somewhat difficult to understand. Installation wasn't much of a problem for me but I have a lot of tools and have done things like this before. The first timer might have problems installing it and making it level. A template would be very helpful for someone without experience.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Professional electrician was confused over lack of instruction provided as it came with plug in cord. He did figure it out together with my GC but it sure made me, the home owner nervous. Please note red light stays on, signaling it is off! Green light is on! It does get hot! be careful. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Tagg

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, solid build quality, looks very nice, warms towels very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A nice towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: It is very helpful in a bathroom, especially in a bathroom without windows, i.e. without a ventilation. The towels are always dry and the air is not damp that prevents mold development. The only feature that I would add is a thermostat to maintain a permanent temperature.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Dry towels are cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep towels try and warm. I think it kills bacterial on the wet towels too.
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo78

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Towels hang nicely and are toasty warm. It was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Went over to England and everyone had these in their homes. Couldn't believe we didn't in the US! Went home and needed to get one immediately. So glad I did! Looks lovely, provides cozy towels every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my Heatgene towel warmer. It looks great in my bathroom and warms towels very nicely! I am glad I tried it and very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lich

customer_reviews.title: This heats up well and has a nice nickel finish.
customer_reviews.text: This heats up nicely and has a nice finish. If there had been a taller and wider one I would have bought it. It would be nice if you had a choice of which side the plug was on also.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Check product for damage upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken but return window passed before I was ready to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this
customer_reviews.text: It did boot warm up my towel in 15 minutes, nor did it warm it all the way through. And it is from China so the cost of returning it is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great construction. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SOLID. Heavy stainless steel. Puts out enough heat to dry 3 towels and keep them warm. The design is the best with the on/off switch on the top right. Need a plug-in style to avoid getting an electrician to hard wire. This replaced a free-standing floor model. Should have done that a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.  Did not keep towel warm.
customer_reviews.text: This was in a small enclosed back room with a hot tub. It did not keep towel warm at all. Very disappointed. Especially for the price. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: BAFTF

customer_reviews.title: Nice but for just one towel
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough top to bottom to hold two towels, otherwise very nice. They don't give any install dimensions so I suggest you fully assemble before measuring for drilling for wall mounts. The legs were not entirely square to the main frame so needed some twisting/bending to install once holes were drilled and mounting bases were attached to wall.
customer_reviews.author: JerryG

customer_reviews.title: heating the towels and as benefit the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: the on/off switch is at an awkward position,once on the wall hard to reach and to see. The rack could be bigger and the distances between the bars wider. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I've used the towel warmer twice and neither time was the towel warm. The first time I only had it on for 20 min, so the 2nd time I let it run for 1 hour before use. Not even warm. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: acg3881

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive build quality. Easy to install. Nice and hot. Really impressed. One odd thing is the size of the power cord. For a 115watt device, its huge.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good heated towel rack.
customer_reviews.text: Using to heat my towels. Other racks I have had discolored the towels from the heat. So far so good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Honestly we love this. Our towels are never damp and they are nice and warm when we go to use them. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet expectations. Needs to be on for about an hour before using to heat up a towel. Also felt it was too small for two proper towels. And the curve although attractive, I think a straight bar would have more surface contact and be a little more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Loaf

customer_reviews.title: clean design but not great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: One of the four brackets had a stripped screw and would not completely tighten.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that my towel completely dries before my next use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tara

product_meta.title: HEATGENE Towel Warmer 8 Bar Plug-in Curved Bath Towel Heater Brushed
feature_bullets: 【CURVED BAR DESIGN】: The HEATGENE towel warmer’s curved design is convenient for hanging towel and uses 8 bars to evenly distribute heat, warming up to 2 large towels or bathrobes. The color will fit any decor. You can put multiple items on it at once, but not overlapping,making it ideal for warming up towels. Your family will get cozy towels whenever they step out of the shower.

【FAST HEATING& OVERHEAT PROTECTION】: Simply turn on the switch,15 minutes Warm towel,60 minutes warmer will reach optimum temperature 149°F,2-8 hours drying a completely wet towel. Built-In a thermostat which can keep the temperature at 149°F(65°C)and save energy. It won't make the heat pipe too hot and cause the towel to burn out. （Note: Actual temperature will depend on the surrounding temperature & humidity)

【SPACE-SAVING&WALL-MOUNTED】: The towel warmer is a perfect towel heating solution for homes. This is a wall-mounted and Plug-in towel warmer that you can install on the wall. It’s design maximizes the space of your floor space.modern style, suitable for space of your home bathroom,hotel,spa and even for the outdoor area.Not only a perfect towel heater, but also a wonderful bathroom decoration

【EASY INSTALLATION AND CLEAN】: The towel warmer is easy to clean and made of durable 304 stainless steel with either brushed or mirror polish finishes. All necessary hardware and tools are included in the package, and it is easty to install with its included instructions. The towel warmer is powered by a standard electrical outlet (rated voltage: AC 120V/60Hz)
【2 YEAR WARRANTY】:2 year warranty is covered by our manufacturer’s warranty for peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Shipped from USA warehouse,As usual delivery time is 3-7 work days
